results.name: The second left hand column of triangle A167552.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
xref: Equals the second left hand column of A167552.
Other left hand columns are A005408, A167555, A168302 and A168303.
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Nov 10 2009
